Calculator.summary: The main Calculations class. Contains the main method for passing in a string to get a calculation.

remarks.para: This class can perform a calculation from a string with math operations.
All numbers in thes string are treated as doubles.
Order of operations is taken in account for the calculations.
The product is returned as a double.

Calculation.summary: Performs math calculations inside of a string.
Calculation.returns: The product of a string of operations.
Calculation.exception: Thrown when a malformed expression is passed.
